what: Checks if a channel username has been stored locally — tp_get_username
title: Checks if a channel username has been stored locally — tp_get_username
text: Channel usernames necessary reproduce urls posts.

title: Checks if a channel username has been stored locally — tp_get_username
code: tp_get_username(channel_name = NULL, channel_id = NULL, path = NULL)

title: Checks if a channel username has been stored locally — tp_get_username
text: path Path folder tp_usernames.csv file expected located. usually folder Telegram archives stored.

title: Checks if a channel username has been stored locally — tp_get_username
text: data frame one row three columns (channel_id, channel_name, channel_username) relevant data previously stored. Otherwise, returns NULL.

title: Checks if a channel username has been stored locally — tp_get_username
code: tp_set_username(channel_name = "BBC News | Русская служба") #> Error in tp_select(path = path, channel_name = channel_name): `path` must be a folder, and /home/runner/telegramparser isn't.

what: Rename Telegram export files consistently — tp_rename
title: Rename Telegram export files consistently — tp_rename
text: json files file name starting "result" renamed.

title: Rename Telegram export files consistently — tp_rename
code: tp_rename(path = NULL, recurse = FALSE, preview = FALSE)

title: Rename Telegram export files consistently — tp_rename
text: path Path folder "result.json" files stored. recurse Defaults FALSE. TRUE, files sub-folders similarly processed. preview Defaults FALSE. TRUE

title: Rename Telegram export files consistently — tp_rename
text: preview set TRUE, returns path files renamed tibble two columns, old_path new_path. set FALSE, returns tibble, invisibly.

title: Rename Telegram export files consistently — tp_rename

what: Select a Telegram channel from a folder where multiple archives are stored — tp_select

text: Select Telegram channel folder multiple archives stored

title: Select a Telegram channel from a folder where multiple archives are stored — tp_select
code: tp_select(path = NULL, channel_name = NULL, channel_id = NULL)

title: Select a Telegram channel from a folder where multiple archives are stored — tp_select
text: path Path folder Telegram archives json format previously stored. channel_name Defaults NULL. Name channel, must match exactly. aware , principle, different channels can exactly name can change name, channel_id generally safer. channel_id Defaults NULL. Numeric identifier channel, must match exactly.

title: Select a Telegram channel from a folder where multiple archives are stored — tp_select
text: vector paths json files corresponding relevant Telegram channel.

what: Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels — tp_set_username
title: Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels — tp_set_username
text: Channel username necessary re-create links channels posts. Unfortunately, retrieved export json files needs added manually.

title: Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels — tp_set_username
code: tp_set_username(   channel_name = NULL,   channel_id = NULL,   channel_username = NULL,   path = NULL )

title: Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels — tp_set_username
text: channel_username Username Telegram channel, either link (e.g. "https://t./username"), username ("@username"), plain text ("username"). Either way, username stored consistently internally plain text. path Path folder tp_usernames.csv file expected located. usually folder Telegram archives stored.

title: Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels — tp_set_username
text: data frame one row three columns (channel_id, channel_name, channel_username) relevant data previously stored. Otherwise, returns NULL.

title: Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels — tp_set_username
text: Information cached locally file called tp_usernames.csv located path folder. channel_username given, user requested add interactively.

title: Set the channel username for locally stored Telegram channels — tp_set_username
code: tp_set_username(   channel_name = "BBC News | Русская служба",   channel_username = "bbcrussian" ) #> Error in tp_select(path = path, channel_name = channel_name): `path` must be a folder, and /home/runner/telegramparser isn't.
